segmentosSRT.text: No, Fugui's signature is on each one.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: Long'er, is our Xu family home...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text:
A gambling debt's a debt,
and debts must be paid.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: So let's do what must be done.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: I thought I'd live my final days here.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08

segmentosSRT.text: I'll cut him into pieces! I'll clobber him!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_08
